title: Caesar Salad
caption: Fresh, crunchy, and perfect for a light meal.
steps:
Wash and chop the lettuce.
Add croutons and parmesan.
Toss with Caesar dressing before serving.

title: Tacos
caption: Fun and customizable dinner idea.
steps:
Cook ground beef with taco seasoning.
Fill taco shells with meat, lettuce, and cheese.
Add salsa or sour cream if desired.

title: Quesadillas
caption: Cheesy and quick to make snack.
steps:
Place cheese (and chicken) between tortillas.
Cook on skillet until golden on both sides.
Cut into wedges and serve.

title: Guacamole & Chips
caption: Simple and tasty party dip.
steps:
Mash avocados with lime juice and salt.
Serve with tortilla chips for dipping.

title: Grilled Salmon
caption: Healthy and flavorful fish dish.
steps:
Season salmon with oil, lemon, salt, and pepper.
Grill for 4-5 minutes per side.
Serve with vegetables or rice.

title: Omelette
caption: Fast and protein-packed breakfast.
steps:
Whisk eggs with milk.
Cook in pan until almost set, then add cheese and veggies.
Fold in half and serve.

title: Roast Vegetables
caption: Easy side dish with lots of flavor.
steps:
Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Roast at 200°C for 20–25 minutes.

title: Mac & Cheese
caption: Creamy and cheesy comfort food.
steps:
Cook pasta until al dente.
Make a cheese sauce with butter, milk, and cheese.
Mix pasta with sauce and serve.

title: Smoothie Bowl
caption: Colorful and nutritious breakfast option.
steps:
Blend berries, banana, and yogurt until smooth.
Pour into bowl and top with granola and fresh fruit.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
caption: Classic dessert, crispy outside and chewy inside.
steps:
Cream butter and sugar together.
Mix in flour and chocolate chips.
Scoop onto tray and bake at 180°C for 10–12 minutes.
